Player:GetPing.description: Returns the ping of a player

Player:GetControlledCharacter.description: Returns the character of the player. If the player has not yet been assigned a character, nil is returned.

Player:Possess.description: Bind the Player to a Character

Player:UnPossess.description: Release the Player from the Character

Player:onPossess.description: A Player was bound to a Character

Player:onUnPossess.description: A Character was released from the Player
